thread.title: Apple hopes size matters with biggest ever iPad
thread.title_full: Apple hopes size matters with biggest ever iPad

title: Apple hopes size matters with biggest ever iPad
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Apple hopes size matters with biggest ever iPad Tim Cook introduces the new iPad Pro in San Francisco Reuters James Dean Technology Correspondent Published 1 minute ago 
A giant iPad as big and powerful as a laptop computer was the centrepiece of the latest launch of Apple products in San Francisco last night. 
The unveiling of the iPad Pro came as Apple announced new touchscreen technology for its iPhones, a design partnership with the French fashion house Hermès for Apple Watch, and a fourth version of Apple TV. 
The iPad Pro is the most significant update Apple has made to its iPad line since it launched its first tablet computer in 2010. Sales of the iPad have been falling over the past year.
